alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range; Yukon Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 15 at 6:11AM AKDT until October 15 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow, rain and freezing rain occuring. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range, Dalton Highway Summits, Yukon Flats, White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River and Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed snow, rain and freezing rain will change over to rain and snow by noon today. The precipitation will taper off from Ft Yukon south about noon, and taper off this late afternoon north of Ft Yukon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range; Yukon Flats
